Hi Pilot Point Intermediate families!

I have some exciting news - our school won a spot in a selective public health program designed to prevent the spread of illness in our classrooms this flu season! Tired of your kiddo coming home every.single week with another bug? Participating in this program is a great way to solve that problem.

Everyone who participates gets a free Kinsa smart thermometer, plus health alerts and tips when illness levels are high in your kiddo’s grade.

Signing up takes less than 5 minutes. Simply text FLUENCY TO 555888 and follow the instructions.

Let’s shoot for 100% participation!

Suzie Loftis, RN - School Nurse

WHERE: Stanley Ford
Hwy 377, Pilot Point, TX

*Donation of $20 per test-drive, up to 300 total test-drives, for a maximum total donation of $6,000 per event. Limit (1) donation per person and (1) donation per household. NO PURCHASE NECESSARY, MUST BE 18 YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER WITH A DRIVER’S LICENSE AND VALID AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE.
